properties.name: filter
properties.description: The search string used to find navigator.contacts.

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Determines if the find operation returns multiple navigator.contacts. Defaults to false.

properties.name: desiredFields
properties.description: Contact fields to be returned back. If specified, the resulting Contact object only features values for these fields.

properties.name: hasPhoneNumber
properties.description: (Android only): Filters the search to only return contacts with a phone number informed.
